item.title: A Beginner's Guide to Sourcing Raw Materials for Your Makerspace Projects
item.description:
Starting a new project at the makerspace is exciting, but knowing where to get your raw materials can be a hurdle â€” especially for new makers. Whether you’re crafting with wood, metal, textiles, electronics, or using CNC tools, a range of affordable and accessible sources can get you started. Here’s a roundup of key material sources to spark your next project:

Woodworking & CNC Materials

Whether you’re laser cutting or crafting by hand, wood is a staple. Look for:
